New Records: Dallas Mavericks won the season series 3-1 against the Portland Trail Blazers
Anfernee Simons had a poor performance with multiple turnovers late in the game
Key Match Events: Portland Trail Blazers led by 10 points late in the fourth quarter
Dallas Mavericks mounted a 16-0 run to erase the deficit
Blazers' players like Anfernee Simons and Shaedon Sharpe had poor performances leading to their collapse
Post-Match Reflections: Dallas Mavericks improved to 22-16 following the win
Mavericks' win despite missing key players was a significant achievement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was close with the Blazers holding a late lead but failing to maintain it
Dallas Mavericks showcased a balanced attack and strong defensive effort
